lines.text: Frankly, I think immortality's been done to death, don't you think?
Frankly, the Jesus of the Gospels can be a bit of a wet liberal at times.
I'm doing some research on this 17th century cleric who lived in this house. He thought he could make himself immortal.
Then I should imagine he had a great disappointment in store.
Possibly, though I saw him last night in the dining room.
What would you say if I told you that I had evidence of an individual who survived death in some form?
I'm sorry, I'm afraid I don't deal with the paranormal, I'm a priest.
